subject: Good day to you dear custome
body:
Good day to you dear customer,  
your messages are  well received,
with your information and everything is processed,
Be aware that all beneficiary’s will be responsible for processing
charges which cannot be deducted from the fund.
Because there’s a bond
holding the Fund that stated that only the sole beneficiary of
the fund is permitted to touch funds, charges is only $50
also note that the federal high court here will alert the United State
Bureau and also your state police immediately your transfer is completed
as to avoid any restrictions of problems before the
fund get to its port of destination.
Below is the cashier details to send the charges via Ria
Money transfer. or money-gram, or kindly get to apple store and
 get apple
card o $50
 and get back to me with the receipts and picture o the card
Ria Money Transfer Information.
Full Name: F. C.
Country: Benin Republic
Amount: $50
Telephone: +229 5941-2456
Address:   Cotonou, Benin
Text Question: Color
Answer: White
Get back with the MTCN# numbers for easier confirmation.

subject: Re:   Good day to you dear custome
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm a bit confused about the process you've described. Could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? What exactly are these processing charges for? And why can't they be deducted from the fund?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the federal high court here will alert the United State Bureau and also your state police"? I'm not sure I understand this part.

Lastly, could you tell me more about this Ria Money Transfer or Apple card method? How does it work and why is it necessary?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Rod
